method.name: jMX
method.comment: Returns a list of mail servers for domain provided. Example Below Dim m As jMXLookup Dim asi As String = "yahoo.com" Dim site() As String site = Array As String(asi) m.JMX(site) Dim ter As TextReader ter.Initialize(File.OpenInput("C:\Results\","MXResults.txt")) 'initializes the file for input txtA1.Text = ter.ReadAll
